Package com.project.dao.files

Class FilesDaoInFile

java.lang.Object
com.project.dao.files.FilesDaoInFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudDao<File>, FilesDao
@Component("FilesDaoInFile") public class FilesDaoInFile extends Object implements FilesDao
Class for working with storage of files in a file that implements the FilesDao interface
